fields.name: connectTimeout
doc: The maximum time an `HttpClient` can wait when connecting to a remote host. (Default: 120s)

fields.name: readTimeout
doc: The maximum time an `HttpClient` can stay idle. (Default: 120s)

fields.name: requestTimeout
doc: The maximum time an `HttpClient` waits until the response is completed. (Default: 120s)

fields.name: useProxyProperties
doc: Sets whether `HttpClient` should use the default http.proxy* system properties
to obtain proxy information. This differs from `useProxySelector(boolean)`
in that HttpClient will use its own logic to handle the system properties,
potentially supporting other protocols that the the JDK ProxySelector doesn't.
If useProxyProperties is set to `true` but `useProxySelector`
was also set to true, the latter is preferred.
